{{cpp/io/basic_ios/title|narrow}}
{{cpp/io/basic_ios/navbar}}
{{ddcl|
char narrow( char_type c, char dfault ) const;
}}

Converts a current locale-specific character {{c|c}} to its standard equivalent. The result is converted from {{tt|char_type}} to {{c/core|char}} if needed. If no conversion can be performed, the function returns {{c|dfault}}.

Effectively calls {{c|std::use_facet&lt; std::ctype&lt;char_type&gt; &gt;(getloc()).narrow(c, dfault);}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|c|character to convert}}
{{par|dfault|character to return if the conversion was unsuccessful}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Character converted to its standard equivalent and then to {{c/core|char}}. {{c|dfault}} is returned if the conversion fails.
